markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Interact ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The cauldron casts [_nightmare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=208) (DC 35) on a target creature that you know by name. The target must be on the same plane as you. If the target fails its save and is 15th level or lower, you add its nightmare to the cauldron. The cauldron can hold only six nightmares at a time; when you add a new nightmare, you choose which six to keep.
name: Interact (divination)
